title: Nelson, California
text: Nelson (formerly, Nelson Station) is an <a href="unincorporated%20area">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Butte%20County%2C%20California">Butte County</a>, <a href="California">California</a>. It lies south-southeast of <a href="Durham%2C%20California">Durham</a>, at an elevation of 121 feet (37 m). Nelson's first post office was established in 1873; its <a href="zip%20code">zip code</a> is 95958. The place was founded in 1873 by the <a href="California%20and%20Oregon%20Railroad%20Company">California and Oregon Railroad Company</a> and named for an early settler, A.D. Nelson.
